## Community.getTip() method

returns the TIP as a CID of the ChainTree. This is more of a convenience function around getting the current state, and then casting the tip, etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTip(did: string): Promise<CID>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  did | <code>string</code> | The DID of the ChainTree |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<CID>`
